content.raw: I now implemented a simple solution that ensures a minimum horizontal resolution of 2048 pixels per camera/texture (vertical resolution is set accordingly). I think that should be safe regarding the GPU's max. texture size. Of course one could exceed this 2048 by setting a higher sample count, but I think that’s unlikely for now. And I think the results are "good enough" or do you think it's a too low resolution?
content.html: I now implemented a simple solution that ensures a minimum horizontal resolution of 2048 pixels per camera/texture (vertical resolution is set accordingly).
